name: ENDZONE Franchise Manager
description:
ENDZONE Franchise Football Manager is an all-new way to experience a Mobile Football Management Game on the go.

Pick and lead your team through exhibitions, seasons, and championship bowl matches all the way to become a Legendary Franchise Football Manager.

FEATURES
- A realistic and authentic football manager experience
- Take over as the General Manager (GM) of a football franchise team
- Play with today's Football Superstars and Legends in your roster
- Rise to fame in the brand-new State Bowl and National Bowl Championships
- Partner with friend’s football clubs
- Play with managers across the world in Online Multiplayer leagues and championships

ULTIMATE FRANCHISE MANAGEMENT GAME
- Join Managers worldwide to build a Professional Football Roster
- Build football stadiums and facilities in stunning 3D
- Play Football Coach Games to nurture and manage talent in the club practice squad
- Win leagues and championship bowls to be successful as a GM

BUILD YOUR ULTIMATE TEAM
- Decide the superstars to buy and sell on the transfer market
- Find the next football legends from young players
- Coach your team and manage to get the best out of your players
- Find and train your star quarterback, linebacker, and tailback for your roster
- Pick your offense and defensive line-up and decide your matchday playbook

REALISTIC FOOTBALL SIMULATION
- Watch football games live
- Feel the pressure in the Redzone
- Take control of the game pass your way to victory
- Analyze your football team's performance with in-depth statistics
- Watch how your MVP performed

BE A MANAGER
- Your decisions affect the attitude of the football club board, football players, and the football fans
- Fantasy Football Games with realistic game economy
- Every Football player has unique skills, nurture them to be the ultimate team

Disclaimer :
- ENDZONE Franchise Football Manager is free to play.
- ENDZONE Franchise Football Manager requires the internet to play.
- ENDZONE Franchise Football Manager has in-app purchases for in-game items.
- ENDZONE Franchise Football Manager compatibility is not guaranteed for all devices.

Every touchdown is a step towards the prestigious legendary champions super bowl trophy!
